title: 2 Pack Illuminated Light Switch,Paddle Rocker Wall Switch with LED Night Light, Automatic On/Off Sensor, Single Pole, 15Amp 120/277Volt, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #21,871 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #82 in Electrical Light Switches       #82 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: It is easy to replace your standard switches.
It is easy to replace your standard switches.

EASY INSTALLATION: The lighted light switch does not require a neutral, it is easy to replace your kids night lights or the standard switches in nursery with the included wiring instructions. The special pilot light switch can add a contemporary look to a room

STANDARD SWITCH: Single pole electrical wall light switch, rating 15Amp 120/277Volt. Back insert and side terminal wiring, grounding screw. Compatible with LED,Incandescent,CFL, Halogen and Fluorescent lighting. Use with standard wall plate(sold separately)

HIGH QUALITY: Durable construction made of high-quality, impact resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel. Gorgeously designed with a modern minimalist look, and the sturdy construction for long service life. We provide 90-day money back, lifetime warranty and lifetime super friendly support, just buy with confidence

customers_say: Customers find the light switch easy to install, particularly noting it installs like a standard three-way switch, and appreciate how it helps find switches in the dark. The design receives positive feedback for its appearance, with one customer mentioning how well the white color matches their decor. The functionality and brightness receive mixed reviews - while some say it works well and provides a perfect amount of light, others report it doesn't reliably turn on the light and is disappointed by the amount of light provided. The quality and value for money are also mixed, with some finding it well-constructed and good value, while others report defective switches and consider it a waste of money.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood Idea and Product
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I like the product and the idea, but I wish you could order them with the light on the bottom. Although you can turn them upside down to get the light to shine down, the switch is still upside down which is just a minor annoyance.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLOVE THESE LIGHTED LIGHT SWITCHES
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: High-quality switches easily install to provide a modicum of light from an LED when off and entering a dark room.Positive click on & off.I bought a bunch of these to put throughout the house!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I replaced 2 of my existing switches with these at the bottom and top of my stairs where it's usually pretty dark. While they don't make a lot of light, it is enough to see the steps and a bit around them. They worked as intended and the fit was good, not much larger than a standard 3 way switch. I like that it has lights at the top and bottom of the switch. It feels well constructed and the sensor is very responsive lighting up as soon as it gets dark

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Great switch with bonus night light.  No issues, should have purchased these sooner.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Love these , have them in multiple locations , just enough light

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsA must have minor upgrade!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are super cool! They don’t give off so much light you can’t sleep at night but there is no hassle finding the light switch at night. Replaced all our paddle switches with these!

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat for dark rooms
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are great good when walking in the dark and you can’t see anything. Plus they keep the room well lit at night.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These lasted almost 4 years. The switch started to fail recently when I flipped it to the "On" position. The spring mechanism failed to hold it in the on position. I have another one that's starting to fail the same way. This switch is in my bath area, it probably gets used a dozen times a day. I expected this switch to last longer. Moving on to a Leviton.
